Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2010 03:14AM mickie513 wrote: I didn't wait long for my biopsy results which surprised me by being malignant. Now I'm in the black hole waiting for surgery and lymph node removal to be staged and find out what my treatment is going to be. All I can say is that I understand the waiting. I can't even have a conversation on the boards because I know so little. I just want to know.
Posts.Title: Biopsy scheduled next week sas14 awb

Posts.Content: mickie513 wrote: I have breast implants and, at this early point I'm assuming I'll have a lumpectomy. Has anyone else around here had implants going in and was it preserved? I've not met with my surgeon yet so I'm just guessing I won't have a masectomy from the little information I have now. I also assume that I'll have some lymph nodes removed and checked. I'm just full of questions, most can't be answered yet. Dx 12/28/2009, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, 4/10 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy with existing implants mickie513 Brit2001
